languages.text: "Сестра Арджента, благодарение Богу-Императору, вы здесь! И, кажется, готовы к новым испытаниям — впрочем, как и всегда".
"Sister Argenta! Thanks be to the God-Emperor, you are here! And you look as prepared for new trials as ever."
languages.original_text: "Сестра Арджента, благодарение Богу-Императору, вы здесь! И, кажется, готовы к новым испытаниям — впрочем, как и всегда".

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta! Thanks be to the God-Emperor, you are here! And you look as prepared for new trials as always."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta! Thanks be to the God-Emperor, you are here! And you look as prepared for new trials as ever."

languages.text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ！あなたがここにいてくれるとは…神帝陛下に感謝しなければ！いつもながら、新たな試練に向かう覚悟ができているようだ！」
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta! Thanks be to the God-Emperor, you are here! And you look as prepared for new trials as ever."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ！あなたがここにいてくれるとは…神帝陛下に感謝しなければ！いつもながら、新たな試練に向かう覚悟ができているようだ！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “阿洁塔修女！感谢神皇，你也在这里！你和之前一样，看起来已经准备好迎接新的考验了。”
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta! Thanks be to the God-Emperor, you are here! And you look as prepared for new trials as ever."

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔修女！感谢神皇，你也在这里！你和之前一样，看起来已经准备好迎接新的考验了。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¡Hermana Argenta! ¡Gracias al Dios Emperador, está aquí! Y parece tan preparada para el porvenir como siempre».
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta! Thanks be to the God-Emperor, you are here! And you look as prepared for new trials as ever."

traits.locale_text: «¡Hermana Argenta! ¡Gracias al Dios Emperador, está aquí! Y parece tan preparada para el porvenir como siempre».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Schwester Argenta! Dem Gottimperator sei Dank, Ihr seid hier! Und bereit für neue Prüfungen, wie eh und je."
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta! Thanks be to the God-Emperor, you are here! And you look as prepared for new trials as ever."

traits.locale_text: "Schwester Argenta! Dem Gottimperator sei Dank, Ihr seid hier! Und bereit für neue Prüfungen, wie eh und je."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Sœur Argenta ! L'Empereur-Dieu soit loué, vous êtes là ! Et prête à affronter les nouvelles épreuves qui nous attendent, comme toujours. »
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta! Thanks be to the God-Emperor, you are here! And you look as prepared for new trials as ever."

traits.locale_text: « Sœur Argenta ! L'Empereur-Dieu soit loué, vous êtes là ! Et prête à affronter les nouvelles épreuves qui nous attendent, comme toujours. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Rahibe Argenta! Tanrı İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki buradasın! Her zamanki gibi yeni çilelerle yüzleşmeye hazır duruyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta! Thanks be to the God-Emperor, you are here! And you look as prepared for new trials as ever."

traits.locale_text: "Rahibe Argenta! Tanrı İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki buradasınız! Her zamanki gibi yeni çilelerle yüzleşmeye de hazır duruyorsun."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
